alert.note: Alert for Broward (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 30 at 10:19AM EDT until April 30 at 10:45AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Broward County in southeastern Florida... * Until 1045 AM EDT. * At 1019 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near East Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, or 10 miles west of Pembroke Pines, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar and Coral Springs. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for southeastern Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for southeastern Florida.
